meta.title: ALF DANA TECHNICAL SERVICES | Professional Home Services UAE
meta.description: Professional Villa, Apartment & Office Technical Services in UAE. AC, Plumbing, Electrical, Painting, Carpentry & more.

hero.title: Professional Home & Office Technical Services
hero.subtitle: Expert solutions for villas, apartments, and offices across UAE. Quality work, trusted professionals, guaranteed satisfaction.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive technical services for your home and office

ac.name: AC Maintenance
ac.desc: Professional air conditioning installation, maintenance, and repair services for all types of AC units.

plumbing.name: Plumbing
plumbing.desc: Expert plumbing solutions including leak detection, pipe repair, bathroom fittings, and water heater services.

electrical.name: Electrical
electrical.desc: Licensed electrical work including wiring, panel upgrades, lighting installation, and fault diagnosis.

painting.name: Painting
painting.desc: Professional interior and exterior painting services with premium paints and flawless finishing.

carpentry.name: Carpentry
carpentry.desc: Custom carpentry including furniture assembly, door fitting, cabinet making, and woodwork repairs.

tiling.name: Tiling
tiling.desc: Expert tile installation for floors, walls, and bathrooms with precision cutting and grouting.

cleaning.name: Deep Cleaning
cleaning.desc: Thorough deep cleaning services for homes, offices, post-renovation, and move-in/move-out cleaning.

maintenance.name: General Maintenance
maintenance.desc: Comprehensive home maintenance packages covering all aspects of property upkeep and repairs.

why.title: Why Choose ALF DANA?
why.subtitle: We deliver quality, reliability, and expertise in every project

fast.title: Fast Response
fast.desc: Same-day service available. We respond within 1 hour to urgent requests.

expert.title: Expert Team
expert.desc: All technicians are certified, trained, and background-checked professionals.

licensed.title: Licensed & Insured
licensed.desc: Fully licensed by UAE authorities with comprehensive insurance coverage.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.desc: All work comes with a satisfaction guarantee. We fix it right the first time.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by homeowners and businesses across UAE

1.name: Ahmed Al Mansouri
1.text: Excellent service! The team fixed our AC and plumbing issues quickly and professionally. Highly recommended.

2.name: Priya Sharma
2.text: ALF DANA renovated our entire apartment. The quality of work was outstanding and they finished on time.

3.name: Mohammed Hassan
3.text: Reliable, professional, and affordable. My go-to service for all home maintenance needs in UAE.

about.title: About ALF DANA
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Technical Services Partner in UAE
about.story: ALF DANA TECHNICAL SERVICES was founded with a simple mission: to provide high-quality, reliable technical services to homes and businesses across the UAE. With over 10 years of experience, we have grown into one of the most trusted names in villa, apartment, and office maintenance services.
about.mission: To deliver exceptional technical services with integrity, professionalism, and a commitment to quality that exceeds our clients' expectations every time.

chatbot.title: ALF DANA Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm your ALF DANA assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.handoff_msg: I'll connect you with our WhatsApp team for immediate assistance!
chatbot.no_match: I'm not sure about that. Let me connect you with our team.
chatbot.faq_1_a: We offer 8 main services: AC Maintenance, Plumbing, Electrical, Painting, Carpentry, Tiling, Deep Cleaning, and General Maintenance. Which one do you need help with?
chatbot.faq_2_q: How do I get a quote?
chatbot.faq_2_a: Getting a quote is easy! Click the WhatsApp button and tell us your requirement. We'll respond within 1 hour with a detailed quote.
chatbot.faq_3_a: We cover all major areas in UAE including Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah, and Fujairah.
chatbot.faq_4_a: For emergencies, we respond within 1 hour. For scheduled work, we arrange service within 24 hours.
chatbot.faq_5_a: Yes! ALF DANA is fully licensed by UAE authorities and carries comprehensive insurance. All technicians are certified professionals.
chatbot.faq_6_a: Mon–Sat: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM, Sunday: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM. Emergency services available 24/7.

pwa.install_desc: Quick access to our services from your phone
